#summary Get started with creating Jaspersoft reports with Google BigQuery Data Source.Note: New users should start with this page.
= Installation =

Installing and configuring Jaspersoft !BigQuery Connector

= Summary =
  # Sign up for !BigQuery
  # Download Jaspersoft !BigQuery connector
  # Installing Jaspersoft !BigQuery connector
  # Creating a iReport
  # Deploy Jaspersoft !BigQuery connector and iReport to !JasperReports Server
  # Publishing a Report

= Details =

==*1. Sign up for !BigQuery*==
See [https://code.google.com/p/jaspersoft-bigquery-datasource/wiki/ActivatingBigQueryService Sign up for BigQuery] for details.

Note:
Existing !BigQuery users may skip 'Sign up for !BigQuery Service' section in the above link but are adviced to refer to 'Generate API Access ID' subsection for instructions on the properties needed for Jaspersoft-!BigQuery Datasource connection.

==*2. Download Jaspersoft !BigQuery connector*==
Download the following files from the project [https://code.google.com/p/jaspersoft-bigquery-datasource/].The following files are included:
  * jrs-bigquery-X.X.X
  * Jaspersoft-iReport-!BigQueryPlugin-X.X.X
  * js-bigquery-datasource-X.X.X

==*3. Installing Jaspersoft !BigQuery connector*==
 See [https://code.google.com/p/jaspersoft-bigquery-datasource/wiki/ConfiguringiReport Jaspersoft BigQuery Connector Installation in iReport] for details.

==*4. Create a Report*==
 See [https://code.google.com/p/jaspersoft-bigquery-datasource/wiki/ReportCreation Create a Report] for details.

==*5. Deploy the connector and iReport to !JasperReports Server*==
 See [https://code.google.com/p/jaspersoft-bigquery-datasource/wiki/ConfiguringJasperReportsServer Deploying Report to JasperReport Server] for details.  

==*6. Publishing a Report*==
 See [https://code.google.com/p/jaspersoft-bigquery-datasource/wiki/PublishReport Publishing a Report] for details.
